Articles.Content:
Recently, a giant was spotted walking around the Kerbal Space Center. Is this for real, or are they making it up for cash? we do not know. People have been sent to the area to investigate but there was no giant around. Just a kerbal floating on the spaceplane hanger somehow. We are going further into the crime to see what really happened.

Kerbal News Network: The News Network you always trust

(END)

We have recently gained report from a famous kerbal under the alias of 'Danny2462' who refuses to share his name that the 'giant' was actualy a fake. It turned out to be the kerbal on the spaceplane hanger. Crime roadblocks have been lifted but beware of giant signs are staying planted.

Kerbal News Network: The News Network you never trust

(END)

Nice name,

.

Also, great job ripping him off.
isn't "KNN News Network" just a little redundant?
